Description:
Improvement Notice 312470984 served as company have failed to ensure that the exposure of their employees to substances hazardous to health, namely wood dust, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Improvement Notice 312471011 served as Reports of thorough examination for the local exhaust ventilation (LEV) systems which are used as an engineering control for exposure to wood dust, carried out by a competent person, were not available for inspection.
